title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: If the key is blank, externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The system should display the externalized text in the chart, even if the localization key is blank.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Set externalized text in the chart title. 2. Add a localization key and leave it blank. Ensure that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
